content: Client ID successfully copied to clipboard

comment.text: The translation key "ClientCopy" is used to display a success message when a client ID is successfully copied to the clipboard in the OAuth settings form. This message appears as part of a button or dialog that triggers the copy action, indicating that the operation was successful.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Id klienta úspěšně zkopírováno do schránky' is not ideal. 'Id' is an abbreviation that might not be universally understood. 'Schránka' is technically correct for 'clipboard' but might sound slightly formal or technical for a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klient ID úspěšně zkopírováno do schránky

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Klient ID' is not a standard Czech phrase. It is an English borrowing. Using 'ID klienta' might be more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID klienta úspěšně zkopírováno do schránky

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'leikepöydälle' implies copying *to* the clipboard. A more natural phrasing in Finnish would be 'leikepöydälle' or 'muistiinpanoon'. 'Onnistuneesti' is correctly used.

The translation 'ID cliente copiato con successo negli appunti' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Client ID successfully copied to clipboard'. A more common and idiomatic translation would be 'ID cliente copiato correttamente negli appunti'. 'Con successo' is technically correct, but 'correttamente' is preferred in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID cliente copiato correttamente negli appunti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ສໍາເລັດ' is repeated unnecessarily. It appears twice, creating an awkward phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID ຂອງລູກຄ້າສໍາເນົາສູ່ແຜ່ນກ໊ານແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The structure 'ສໍາເລັດສໍາເລັດ' is grammatically incorrect.  'ສໍາເລັດ' already means 'completed' or 'successfully'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID ຂອງລູກຄ້າສໍາເນົາສູ່ແຜ່ນກ໊ານແລ້ວ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ID do cliente copiado com êxito para a área de transferência' is a literal translation but sounds unnatural in Portuguese. 'Área de transferência' is correct, but the phrasing could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID do cliente copiado para a área de transferência.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'copied to clipboard' is better translated as 'copiado para a área de transferência' which is more standard in Brazilian Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID do cliente copiado para a área de transferência

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Romanian translation 'ID client a fost copiat cu succes în clipboard' is not the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Client ID successfully copied to clipboard'. While technically correct, it sounds a bit awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be 'ID-ul clientului a fost copiat cu succes în clipboard' or 'Client ID-ul a fost copiat cu succes în clipboard'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පාරිභෝගික' (paribhōgika) is a less common and slightly formal term for 'client'.  'පාරිශුරක' (pāriśuraka) or a more common synonym might be more appropriate for a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පාරිශුරක or a more common synonym for 'client' is suggested.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing 'පාරිභෝගික හැඳුනුම්පත' (paribhōgika hadannumpata) sounds slightly awkward in modern Sinhala. It's very literal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like 'පාරිශුරක හැඳුම්' (pāriśuraka hadum) or 'පාරිශුරක ID'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ක්ලිප්බෝඩ්' (kḷibbōḍ) is a transliteration of 'clipboard' and while understood, using a more integrated Sinhala term or transliteration might improve readability for a broader audience, especially if a Sinhala equivalent already exists in the application's terminology.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Research if a standard Sinhala term for 'clipboard' is used within the application and use that instead. Alternatively, consider a more integrated transliteration.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: Missing closing quotation mark at the end of the string.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID klienta úspešne skopírované do schránky

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ID odjemalca je bil uspešno kopiran v odložišče" is a literal translation that doesn't quite capture the natural flow of Slovenian. 'Client ID' is best translated as 'ID stranke' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID stranke je bil uspešno kopiran v odložišče

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'odložišče' can sound a little formal for a clipboard action. A more common and natural term would be 'spomin'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ID stranke je bil uspešno kopiran v spomin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'међумеморију' is a less common and potentially confusing translation for 'clipboard'. A more common and readily understood term would be better.

The translation "Klijentski ID uspešno kopiran u međumemoriju" while understandable, isn't the most natural way to express the meaning. 'Clipboard' is often translated as 'nalepnica' in a technical context. 'Međumemorija' is accurate but a bit formal. A more natural phrasing would incorporate 'nalepnica'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Klijentski ID uspešno kopiran na nalepnicu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Đã sao chép id khách vào bộ nhớ tạm thành công' is not a completely accurate representation of "Client ID successfully copied to clipboard".  'id khách' is a literal translation of 'Client ID', which isn't standard Vietnamese terminology in this context. It should be translated to something like 'ID ứng dụng' or 'Mã ứng dụng'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép Mã ứng dụng vào bộ nhớ tạm thành công

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not a major issue, 'bộ nhớ tạm' could be more naturally phrased as 'clipboard' or a more common equivalent in Vietnamese for this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Đã sao chép Mã ứng dụng vào clipboard thành công
